attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to step in and save Portsmouth FC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Portsmouth FC is vital to the City of Portsmouth and it's community.

Due to no fault of the people of Portsmouth , the club is on the verge of closure. We ask that the government to speak to the premier league and ask them to give the club breathing space until a buyer is found as the premier league failed to make vital checks regarding the new owners.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
